name: Tchup-Tchup
description:
The little fire chicken Tchup-Tchup is furious. Every year a mysterious wind blows out all the candles on his cake, except for his very own. Now it's his task as the last candlelight to ensure that all the other candles will burn bright again. 

With the help of his friend Bulle he sets out to a short-caked journey and defies bubbling soda and sticky gummibears.
